Life-saving First Aid Training 



Acute First Aid provides affordable, practical training for thousands of people across the South East. Offering Online E-Learning, classroom courses, or a combination of the two; we’ve got you covered. 







 
Read more











 










 



 



 



 



 



 



 



 










 







Our Company 



Acute First Aid 





 





Experience 



Acute First Aid is led by Ruth Croucher; a highly accomplished trainer, who has over 35 years of experience in first aid training. 





 





Training Courses 



Offering courses that meet the First Aid at Work Regulations and Ofsted approval, we accommodate all your training needs.  





 





FAIB Approved 



The First Aid Industry Body Approval and Monitoring Systems guarantees our consistency and high standards. Our approval Number: FAIB 73/07(372). 















Prepare your workplace for every situation. 



Life is unpredictable. You never know what is around the corner. Our invaluable courses will give you all the skills and knowledge you need to keep your workplace safe. There are plenty of courses to choose from, and we are on hand to advise you if you are unsure which course you need.  








 
View All Courses











 
Make a Booking











 
Get a Free Quote

















First Aid E-Learning at your fingertips. 



Learn at your own pace with our engaging, interactive E-Learning courses. You can conveniently complete the course on any device you choose, and at a time that suits you. 







 
Browse E-Learning











 














Discover more: 









 





FAQ's 



Let us answer your questions.

ai_summarized_context:
**Context Summary for Alt Text Generation:**

- **Organization Name:** Acute First Aid
- **Website Purpose:** The website provides information about first aid training courses, including e-learning and classroom options, aimed at equipping individuals and workplaces with lifesaving skills.
- **Type of Content:** The site features details about various first aid training courses, including online e-learning courses, workplace courses, and in-house training options. It also includes information about the company's background, testimonials, FAQs, and contact details.
- **Target Audience:** Individuals seeking first aid training, workplace safety coordinators, and organizations looking to train employees in first aid.
- **Key Features:**
  - Offers affordable and practical first aid training.
  - Courses meet First Aid at Work Regulations and are Ofsted approved.
  - Led by an experienced trainer, Ruth Croucher, with over 35 years in the field.
  - FAIB (First Aid Industry Body) approved, ensuring high standards.
  - Engaging e-learning courses that can be completed at the learner's own pace.
  - Emphasis on workplace safety and preparedness for emergencies.
- **Current Promotions:** Mention of National Safety Month and a free CPR & AED e-learning course giveaway.

This context can be used to create alt text that accurately describes images related to first aid training, workplace safety, or the training environment provided by Acute First Aid.
ai_predicted_alt_text: View this Instagram post about first aid training courses.
